Topic.Title: The Use/Give tutorial in online version

Posts.EditableText:
Hi, I am trying to follow the tutorial.....am stuck on the use/give part (the defibrillator bit). More specifically, in the 'Now add a “Set object flag” command. Choose Bob from the objects list, and enter the flag name “alive”' part. How do i do this on online version?
The tutorial says 'A Script Editor window will now pop up. In this script, we want to print a message to tell the player what’s happening, and also set the “alive” flag on Bob.' but no such window popped up.
EDIT: figured it out.
Posts.HTML:
Hi, I am trying to follow the tutorial.....am stuck on the use/give part (the defibrillator bit). More specifically, in the 'Now add a “Set object flag” command. Choose Bob from the objects list, and enter the flag name “alive”' part. How do i do this on online version?
The tutorial says 'A Script Editor window will now pop up. In this script, we want to print a message to tell the player what’s happening, and also set the “alive” flag on Bob.' but no such window popped up.
